markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Portable](/Traits.aspx?ID=412)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 235</row>

Portable siege weapons, such as [battering rams](/SiegeWeapons.aspx?ID=3), can be more easily carried and have a role in both warfare and smaller conflicts or exploration.
name: Portable
